question: Under the Hybrid Annuity Model, Government pays how much percentage of the project cost during the initial stage?
explanation: Under the Hybrid Annuity Model, Government pays 40% of the project cost as fixed amount in five equal installments during the construction stage. The remaining 60% is paid in the form of annuities, based on the value of the project after its completion. Hybrid Annuity Model is used by NHAI.
